stories.Title: Large models could be Smol.ai
stories.Description: Meet smol developer! This junior developer agent is the perfect AI assistant: it can take your product specification and scaffold out an entire codebase for you.
stories.Tweet: Large models could be Smol.ai 📦 Meet smol developer! This junior developer agent is the perfect AI assistant: it can take your product specification and scaffold out an entire codebase for you. #programming https://github.com/smol-ai/developer

stories.Title: Sam Altman testifies before Congress
stories.Description: During the Senate hearing, OpenAI's CEO recognized the public's concerns regarding the advancements of AI and emphasized the need for government intervention to mitigate risks.
stories.Tweet: Sam Altman testifies before Congress 📦 During the Senate hearing, OpenAI's CEO recognized the public's concerns regarding the advancements of AI and emphasized the need for government intervention to mitigate risks. #openai https://apnews.com/article/chatgpt-openai-ceo-sam-altman-congress-73ff96c6571f38ad5fd68b3072722790

stories.Title: AI boost for Biotech and Pharma
stories.Description: Google Cloud has released two AI-powered tools aimed at the advancement of precision medicine and drug discovery, a bold move for its leadership in the AI race.
stories.Tweet: AI boost for Biotech and Pharma 📦 Google Cloud has released two AI-powered tools aimed at the advancement of precision medicine and drug discovery, a bold move for its leadership in the AI race. #google https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/16/google-cloud-launches-ai-tools-to-accelerate-drug-discovery.html

stories.Title: South Korea's tech giants plan to challenge ChatGPT
stories.Description: Leveraging their semiconductor data and expertise, Samsung and Naver have joined forces to develop a generative AI platform for corporate users.
stories.Tweet: South Korea's tech giants plan to challenge ChatGPT 📦 Leveraging their semiconductor data and expertise, Samsung and Naver have joined forces to develop a generative AI platform for corporate users. #samsung https://www.kedglobal.com/artificial-intelligence/newsView/ked202305140002

stories.Title: Zoom announces collaboration with Anthropic
stories.Description: The company intends to improve customer experience by integrating the Claude chatbot into Zoom's Contact Center.
stories.Tweet: Zoom announces collaboration with Anthropic 📦 The company intends to improve customer experience by integrating the Claude chatbot into Zoom's Contact Center. #zoom https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/16/zoom-announces-anthropic-partnership-to-bring-claude-chatbot-to-zoom-products/

stories.Title: OpenAI introduces Shap-E AI
stories.Description: With this generative AI tool available for open-source download, you can create 3D assets effortlessly from text descriptions or provided images.
stories.Tweet: OpenAI introduces Shap-E AI 📦 With this generative AI tool available for open-source download, you can create 3D assets effortlessly from text descriptions or provided images. #openai https://github.com/openai/shap-e

stories.Title: Apple previews new accessibility updates
stories.Description: With features like Assistive Access and Live Speech, this latest software update demonstrates the company's commitment to providing greater independence to users with cognitive disabilities.
stories.Tweet: Apple previews new accessibility updates 📦 With features like Assistive Access and Live Speech, this latest software update demonstrates the company's commitment to providing greater independence to users with cognitive disabilities. #apple https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2023/05/apple-previews-live-speech-personal-voice-and-more-new-accessibility-features/

stories.Title: Another amazing discovery from NASA’s Webb
stories.Description: Astronomers have detected water vapor around a comet in the main asteroid belt for the first time, offering new insights into the origins of water in our solar system.
stories.Tweet: Another amazing discovery from NASA’s Webb 📦 Astronomers have detected water vapor around a comet in the main asteroid belt for the first time, offering new insights into the origins of water in our solar system. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/nasa-s-webb-finds-water-and-a-new-mystery-in-rare-main-belt-comet

stories.Title: Artemis II crew is getting ready for the Moon
stories.Description: The four astronauts who will participate in NASA's Artemis II mission are preparing for 18 months of intensive training that begins in June.
stories.Tweet: Artemis II crew is getting ready for the Moon 📦 The four astronauts who will participate in NASA's Artemis II mission are preparing for 18 months of intensive training that begins in June. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/nasa-gears-up-to-train-artemis-ii-crew-for-moon-mission

stories.Title: Amazon search just got “conversational”
stories.Description: The company is planning a revolutionary product search experience with an interactive AI-powered chatbot that provides personalized suggestions, product comparisons, and answers to user queries.

stories.Title: ZEEKR's aspirations in Europe's EV market
